More Notes: Percentage of short-run effects of extreme heat exposure on TFP offset by adaptation
Percentage of short-run effects of extreme heat exposure on agricultural output (yield) loss offset by adaptation
Percentage of short-run impacts of extreme heat exposure on China's agricultural TFPs mitigated by long-run adaptations. Confidence interval [CI].
Percentage of the short-run effect on yield is offset in the long run. Confidence interval [CI].
Difference in negative impact on yield between short-run and long-run effects due to farmers' adaptation.
Yield is expected to decrease by 4.4% with an additional one-day cumulative exposure to temperatures above 33°C during the year.
Percentage of short-run effects of extreme heat on China's agricultural TFP offset by longer-run adaptation.
Percentage of short-run effects of extreme heat on China's agricultural yield offset by longer-run adaptation.
Long-run impact on China’s agricultural TFP of an additional one-day cumulative exposure to temperatures above 33°C during the year.
Long-run impact on agricultural yield of an additional one-day cumulative exposure to temperatures above 33°C during the year.
Adaptation is the percentage of short-run yield impacts offset in the long run (Panel C: (1-β2LD/β2FE) * 100%). Includes 5% and 95% bootstrap percentiles.
Adaptation is the percentage of short-run TFP impacts offset in the long run (Panel C: (1-β2LD/β2FE) * 100%). Includes 5% and 95% bootstrap percentiles.
Adaptation is the percentage of short-run Labor impacts offset in the long run (Panel C: (1-β2LD/β2FE) * 100%). Includes 5% and 95% bootstrap percentiles.
Adaptation is the percentage of short-run Fertilizer impacts offset in the long run (Panel C: (1-β2LD/β2FE) * 100%). Includes 5% and 95% bootstrap percentiles.

Adaptation related to Yield, using baseline IDW radius of 100km.  β2FE is the coefficient for GDD above threshold in the panel fixed effects model. β2LD is the coefficient for GDD above threshold in the long difference model.  This measures the percentage of short-run negative impacts offset in the long run.

Adaptation related to Agricultural TFP, using baseline IDW radius of 100km. β2FE is the coefficient for GDD above threshold in the panel fixed effects model. β2LD is the coefficient for GDD above threshold in the long difference model.
